document_data.name: Briennelle Zaharina
document_data.mainbody: '''Briennelle Zaharina''', or '''Brie-Zara''', was the [[half-drow]] daughter of [[Drizzt Do'Urden]] and [[Catti-brie]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Catti-brie gave birth to their daughter Briennelle Zaharina—named for both of her grandfathers, [[Bruenor Battlehammer]] and [[Zaknafein]]—during the war between all the houses of [[Menzoberranzan]] outside and beneath [[Gauntlgrym]] in the {{YearlinkName|1488}}.
document_data.Description: The child had auburn hair, like her mother, and her eye color was like her father's, except a deeper, jewel-toned purple. Brie-Zara's skin tone was somewhere between her parents' coloring, like a pink flower at dusk in hue.
